change.action: Do you want to change your latest message?
change.fallback: Please answer with yes or no if you want to update your latest statement!

capabilities.action: I provide you with a few information about drones, specifically so called quadcopters. Please answer the questions for optimal feedback on which drone suits you most.
capabilities.fallback: You already got to know what I can do. general information can be found on the website from dipul. Let's start with the Test!

start.action: Hey, you are about to start or restart your personal drone test, please confirm and stick with the questions to make this as convenient as possible.

exit.action: You are about to exit this session, please confirm your decision.
exit.fallback: Please answer with yes or no if you want to exit this session!

greeting.action: Hello, I am your assistance at finding your sort of drone according to your application. You can get started by saying: "Begin", or similar.

recommendation.action: We evaluated the data you provided. Please answer anything to receive it!

finish.action: You finished your journey, you can find general information at the 'Info' screen, and an extended review your results in the 'Evaluation' screen. Thank you for using this Tool!
